compatible.helper: Make the pack compatible with language files in other packs. This option will overwrite Memified Chinese onto Simplified Chinese, thus you only need to select "Simplified Chinese" in the language menu. Learn more at README.md.
compatible.label: Compatible option
compatible.disabled: You are playing game version older than 1.13, thus this is forced to set to on.

child.label: Child Mode
helpers: For children with immature mentality. Extra protected and censored. Recommended for streaming and recording.
For teenagers. Only political and especially suggestive contents are censored. Suitable for streaming and recording.
For fully grown adult minds. NO censoring at all. We DO NOT recommended this for streaming and recording.
child.censoredHelper: Due to the ongoing maintenance, Child Mode options are locked. We are sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please check out our Bilibili account for more information.

bedrockHint.text: We assume that you are using the latest Minecraft version. Read more at

form.idk: If you don't know how to use the advanced build options, feel free to click the submit button and download the pack straight away.

log.headline: Build log

ad.title: Don't click the button just yet. We need your support today.
ad.dismiss: No, thanks. I don't care and I just want to see the download.
ad.dismissSnackbar: Sorry for the inconvenience and shameless moral coercion! We have disabled this prompt until your next session. However, we really need your help. If you changed your mind, you can always press the Donate button. Thanks!
ad.firstTime: This might be a bit awkward, but please don't scroll away. Today we humbly ask for your help in order for us to better create. We never any ads on the website, but it needs Ôø•5 to survive every day. This fund has been paid by members of the Studio since Day 1. If you can donate Ôø•10 today, we will work harder than ever, and you will be shouted out on out bilibili post. If our pack has ever brought you Ôø•10 worth of fun and laughter, please give us some support now. Thank you.
ad.reconsider: Hey! Nice to see ya! We are asking you for help again. You may not like it, but we need your help. If you are still hesitating, we want you pull out some info: We never any ads on the website, but it needs Ôø•5 to survive every day. This fund has been paid by members of the Studio since Day 1. If you can donate Ôø•10 today, we will work harder than ever, and you will be shouted out on out bilibili post. ad.renew: Thanks for your previous support! Even if you just clicked the link to have a look, but thank you anyway. It really helps us A LOT! Although this is kinda shameless, but it's been a while since your previous donation. If you want to keep supporting our creation, please click the Donate button. Nope? All right, no problem! Thank you.
ad.donationNotice: Please do not make a donation unless you are an adult or with parental advisory. We recommend you to only make a donation if you are economic independent. Full refund available in 7 days after donation (transaction fee not included). Partial refund available in 30 days after donation. Supports Alipay and WeChat Pay. Your transaction will be processed by afdian.net and afidian.net terms apply. 6% transaction fee is needed and will be deducted from your donation.

log.followUpdates: The pack updates quickly! We recommend you to update the pack after some time. You can also follow our <1>Bilibili page</1> for updates.
log.expired: Build logs older than 7 days have been removed.
log.copyright: Memified Chinese is licensed under <1>Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International (CC BY-SA 4.0)</1>. If you intend to reproduce this pack or material derived from this pack, we recommend you to read this <3>Copyright Guide</3>.

quoteAd.subtitle: A word from our sponsor
quoteAd.none: Hmm, nothing here. This is the sponsor message spot. We accept any message except commercial ads. Leave a message?
quoteAd.author: Dianliang233
quoteAd.commercialWarning: Any message that tries to promote a commercial product or service will be ignored and the donation will not be refundable.

sponsor.thankYou: Thank you for your support! Your donation enabled us create better work and really helps us A LOT.

help.title: Help & About
help.thinkTwice: Think twice before submitting any issues!

thinkList.1: Have you read the helpers below every option?
thinkList.2: Have you read the helpers above the download button?
thinkList.3: Have you tried to troubleshoot your game and Mods?

help.sure: If you are sure that Memified Chinese have problems, you can report them to us. Suggestions are welcomed too!

needToKnowList.1: According to the license, the developers don't have to address every single issue.
needToKnowList.2: Please make sure that your issues haven't been submitted by someone else.
needToKnowList.3: Please use Mandarin Chinese or English.
needToKnowList.4: Too many spam issues may cause you to be banned.
needToKnowList.5: Submit issues in the accordingly project. Especially, do not submit in-game content or problem to "Web Builder", it is only for failed builds or problems with the web interface.

license.title: Copyright Guide
license.shareDetail: You MAY copy or distribute this pack in all ways.
license.remixDetail: You MAY modify or remake this pack or create anything based on the content of this pack.
license.revoke: Besides. as long as you DO NOT violate this license agreement, we cannot revoke any rights previously licensed to you.
license.caveat: However, there are some caveats you need to keep an eye on:
license.attributionDetail: You MUST provide the following information in any way you like: Original work name (Memifed Chinese), URL (https://meme.teahouse.team), original author (Teahouse Studios), link to the license (https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/legalcode), as well as whether you have modifed the origial work. You also MUST NOT, in any way, suggest the licensor endorses you or your use.
license.shareAlikeDetail: If you adapted this pack, you MUST share your work under the same license.
license.noRestrictionsDetail: You MUST NOT append additional terms or apply technical restrictions to stop others from doing what the license allows.
license.disclaimer: In addition, we need to disclaim that:
license.exceptionsDetail: You MAY NOT comply with the license for materials in the public domain or where your use is permitted by fair use.
license.warrantyDetail: This pack is provided AS IS without any kinds of warranty. We DO NOT take resposiblity for any damage when using this pack.
license.otherRightsDetail: This license only grants you copyright privileges. Other rights such as publicity, privacy, trademark, or moral rights may limit how you use this pack.
license.notSubstituteDetail: This is not legal advice. This is a human-readable summary of (and not a substitute for) the license.
